Token.Abstract: Extension to NSData class to provide common functions. Added functionality includes: --base64 encoding of an NSData object --MD5 version of an NSData object --Gzip deflated representation of a gzip-compressed NSData object --Hex version of an NSData object
Returns a specified number of random bytes.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The number of bytes of random data to return.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The specified quantity of random bytes or nil if an error occurs.

Token.Abstract: Creates a base64 encoded string for this NSData object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A base64 encoded version of the data.

Token.Abstract: Returns a base64 encoded string for this NSData object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A base64 encoded version of the data.

Token.Abstract: Creates a base64 encoding of this NSData. Similar to newBase64Encoding.

Parameter.Name: base64
Parameter.Abstract: The base64 encoding to use in the new NSData object.

Token.Abstract: Creates an NSData object from a base64 encoded string.

Parameter.Name: encoding
Parameter.Abstract: The string to convert to NSData.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A base64-encoded string version of this object's data.
